with CNNs or other variations. Therefore, I have ensured that examples of each class of neural
network and hybrid models were demonstrated throughout the book. In addition to providing a
playbook to show you how to develop deep learning models for your own time series forecasting
problems, I designed this book to highlight the areas where deep learning methods may show
